summary: Philippe Delambre, the now-adult son of "The Fly", does some transportation experimentation of his own.
cast: Vincent Price|Brett Halsey|David Frankham|John Sutton|Dan Seymour|Danielle De Metz|Jack Daly|Janine Grandel|Michael Mark|Richard Flato|Gregg Martell|Barry Bernard|Pat O'Hara|Francisco Villalobos|Joan Cotton|Court Shepard|Florence Strom|Rick Turner|Ed Wolff|Joe Zboran|John Zimeas
director: Director: Edward Bernds (as Edward L. Bernds)
title: El regreso de la mosca
